kv4.5:1.3: Arahā chahi phassehi, chahi vedanāhi, chahi saññāhi …pe… chahi paññāhi samannāgatoti?
kv4.5:2.3: Arahā cakkhunā rūpaṃ passanto sotena saddaṃ suṇāti, ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṃ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusati, manasā dhammaṃ vijānāti …pe…
kv4.5:2.4: manasā dhammaṃ vijānanto cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, sotena saddaṃ suṇāti, ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṃ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?
kv4.5:3.3: Satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ chahi upekkhāhi samannāgato samohito, cha upekkhāyo paccupaṭṭhitāti?
kv4.5:4.6: Hañci arahā chaḷaṅgupekkho, tena vata re vattabbe—
